input.sentences: the family is having a fun time at the carnival .
they are looking for a ride to ride .
they look and see the merry go round and put their little sister on the ride .
after that they take a picture together .
after the picture it 's time to get some food to eat .
output.sentences: It was a wonderful time hanging out with my family today.
We had so much fun on all of the rides.
This ride made my sister feel really sick.
But it was okay because we still had lots of things to do.
We decided food would be the perfect way to end our day.
